Hamilton Dhlamini (a mụrụ na 15 Disemba 1969), mgbe ụfọdụ dịka Hamilton Dlamini, bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede egwuregwu na onye na-eme fim
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri na telivishọn Isithembiso, Faith like Potatoes na The King's Messenger
A mụrụ ya na 15 Disemba 1969 na obodo dị n'ebe ndịda Johannesburg, nke a na-akpọ Sebokeng, Vaal Triangle, n'ezinaụlọ South Africa dara ogbenye.
Ọ lụrụ onye na-ahụ maka nri na-edozi ahụ, Martha, ebe ha mụtara ụmụ atọ
O zutere Martha na mbụ n'ụgbọelu.
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na mbido afọ 1984 site na ihe nkiri
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye ọchụnta ego Korea na SABC 1 sitcom Mzee Wa Two Six

Na mbido afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro dị mkpirikpi na SABC1, nke William Shakespeare mere King Lear. Ọzọkwa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi na SABC 2 sitcom Stokvel na ọrụ 'Mojo Khumalo'. N'afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na usoro Ten Bush nke Mncedisi Shabangu duziri
Maka ọrụ ya, o mechara merie Naledi Theatre Award maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2009, ya na William Kentridge na Handspring Puppet Company rụkọtara ọrụ na Woyzeck na Highveld.
N'afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Regardt van den Berghńs Faith like Potatoes

N'oge a, ọ meriri South African Film and Television Awards (Safta) maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka ọrụ ya. N'afọ 2007, ọ meriri Golden Horn Award maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Banzi Motaung' na usoro telivishọn a ma ama Isithembiso
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ meriri Golden Horn Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na TV soap opera 'Isithembiso'.
O guzobekwara ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya, 'Ndlondlo Productions'.
